name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Aces at War Bundle
summary: The Aces at War Bundle of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown contained the base game, the Aces at War: A History 2019 art book, and a steelbook. This edition was exclusive to North and South America.
